text: The American Trap () is a 2008 Canadian drama film from Quebec, directed by Charles Binamé."American Trap gets more hype than screens". Montreal Gazette, May 19, 2008. The film stars Rémy Girard as Lucien Rivard, a Canadian working in the criminal underworld of Havana, Cuba who becomes enmeshed in international intrigue around the assassination of John F. Kennedy."Lucien Rivard, man of mystery - maybe too much so". Montreal Gazette, May 16, 2008. ==Cast== * Rémy Girard : Lucien Rivard * Gérard Darmon : Paul Mondolini * Colm Feore : Maurice Bishop * Serge Houde : DEA Agent Thompson * Bill Lake : Herbert Hoover * Manuel Tadros : Joseph Valachi ==Award nominations== The film garnered five Genie Award nominations at the 29th Genie Awards in 2009:"Gross epic, Quebec drama lead; Genie Nominations".
